name: Hammeroids!
description:
Your thruster is broken!

Move with your gun's recoil.
Pick up new guns for points.
Asteroids spawn faster the more points you get.


Dear diary:

I made this game to get unstuck from another project that's been in development heck for a few years.

I think it worked, I feel pretty good after this. I'm really happy with how this game turned out. :D

I may or may not take another crack at finishing that other project now... Or I might just officially abandon it and work on some more small projects like this, IDK. It's nice being able to just have fun and throw something together without having to worry about navigating the huge spaghetti mess of code I made years ago.
